info.author: Ingeniweb
classifiers: Topic :: Software Development :: Libraries :: Python Modules
info.description:
==============
iw.sql package
==============

.. contents::

What is iw.sql ?
================

iw.sql provides a zope 3 utility on the top of z3c.sqlalchemy one, with
some extra features:

- when a SQL server is restarted, any session in memory will fail on next
  query. iw.sql prevents it by providing a session wrapper that knows
  how to relaunch it


How to use iw.sql ?
===================

Explain here how the package is used. Points to doctests here !
info.name: iw.sql
info.summary: Package on the top of z3c.sqlalchemy to provide automatic retries

iw.sql provides a zope 3 utility on the top of z3c.sqlalchemy one, with some extra features:
